bridge.title: Network Mode
bridge.tips_one: When you change the routerâ€™s working mode, you may need to re-connect all your client devices.
bridge.tips_two: When you use Access Point/Extender/WDS mode, you may not connect to this UI again. You can Press and hold the reset button for 4 seconds to revert  to router mode.
bridge.note_one: OpenVPN or Wireguard client is enabled. Please disable them in order to set up bridge mode.
bridge.note_two: Captive Portal is enabled. Please disable it in order to set up bridge mode.
bridge.access_router_wds_tips: After bridging is successful, the router will automatically obtain an IP from the main router. If you need to access this router's UI, you must connect using the IP it obtained from the main router. To get this IP, check the connected clients list in your main routers UI. If you do not have access to the main router UI, you can restore the routing mode by holding down the reset button for 4 seconds.
bridge.access_router_ext_tips: After bridging is successful, if you need to access the UI of this router, you must manually configure your PC/mobile phone to a static IP address in the same range as the router. If you still cannot access it, you can restore the routing mode by holding down the reset button for 4 seconds.
bridge.reset_mac_tips: Please reset your MAC to factory MAC in MAC clone.
bridge.set_up_ap_tips: To set up Access Point mode, you need to connect an Ethernet cable to the WAN port first.
bridge.remove_wan_tips: Please remove the Ethernet cable from the WAN port.
